hero.title: Enterprise-grade landing pages, delivered in one week

deepDive.heading: How it works
deepDive.subtitle: One week from start to launch

steps.title: Define scope upfront
steps.body: Share requirements, goals, and brand assets. Scope is defined before work begins.

steps.title: We build in one week
steps.body: Your landing page or website is built with copy, responsive design, dark/light mode, and performance optimization.

steps.title: One revision included, then launch
steps.body: Review, make adjustments with your included revision, and deploy. Source code delivered.

items.title: Agencies
items.body: Deliver client websites and landing pages with predictable timelines and consistent quality.

items.title: Product Launches
items.body: Get a professional landing page delivered in one week for your launch.

items.title: Marketing Campaigns
items.body: Create dedicated pages for campaigns with fast turnaround.

integrations.heading: Works with your stack
integrations.subtitle: Easy handoff to your existing tools

items.title: Enterprise-Grade Code
items.body: Well-structured, maintainable code following best practices.

items.title: SEO-Ready Structure
items.body: Built with search visibility and performance optimization.

items.title: Responsive + Dark/Light Mode
items.body: Tested across devices with theme support included.

pricing.heading: Simple pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works for you

items.question: How long does it take?
items.answer: Typical timeline is one week from requirements to deployment.

items.question: Can I make changes after delivery?
items.answer: One revision is included. Additional revisions are $100 per revision. You also receive source code to make updates yourself.

items.question: What do I need to provide?
items.answer: Requirements, goals, and brand assets. If needed, access for deployment. We handle design, development, and optimization.
